post.title: Road Rally Reminder
post.content: TechEd is almost upon us – just over one week to go. We had our last track owner meeting yesterday. I’m chasing down speakers for slides (I actually have some already!) and figuring out what seems like a million final details for our track cabana. In addition to the great sessions, we’ve got some cool stuff happening at TechEd this year. Some I can’t quite talk about yet (watch this space) but I did want to remind all TechEd attendees about the Architect Road Rally happening Sunday night, after the precons. Space is limited and subject to first come, first served registration, so register right away!
